name: Pirates of the Caribbean Multiplayer
summary:
Pirates of the Caribbean Multiplayer is a massively multiplayer mobile game based on the series of films and the Disney theme park attraction of the same name.

The game starts you off as an inexperienced captain of a pirate ship with no reputation, no gold and minimal knowledge of the seas around you. But don't despair, Mate! Build up your infamy score by creating alliances with other players, fighting fierce battles and embarking on all manner of adventure and exploration. You'll soon be one of the most feared pirates of the Caribbean!
